title: Morning Star
summaries: The Morning Star is a Hardmode, post-Plantera whip dropped by Blue, Rusty, and Hell Armored Bones in the Hardmode Dungeon with a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) / 1*399/40000 (1%) chance.

Like other whips, it causes <linked>minions</linked> and <linked>sentries</linked> to focus on the last-struck <linked>enemy</linked> and increases their damage against the target by 8. Uniquely, it also grants minions and sentries the ability to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> at a fixed 12% chance.
If the Morning Star hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 5%.
